item.title: House GOP produces wide-ranging health care bill they plan to vote on next week
item.description: House Republicans finalized a bill on Friday that Speaker Mike Johnson said will provide "clear, responsible alternatives" to Obamacare.

item.title: Court pauses Judge Boasberg's criminal contempt pursuit of Trump officials

item.title: Seized oil tanker was hiding its location to evade sanctions, law enforcement

item.title: DOJ tries to block Boasberg's contempt hearings against the Trump administration

item.title: Preservationist group sues Trump over White House ballroom
item.description: President Trump is being sued by the nonprofit National Trust for Historic Preservation to stop the construction of the new White House ballroom.
